sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from './DashboardLayout'; import '../App.css'; const BuyerDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('rfqs'); // Mock data const rfqs = [ { id: 1, catalog: 'Premium Electronics Components', seller: 'VEND-23-ABC123', status: 'priced', price: '$5200', validity: '2025-12-31' }, { id: 2, catalog: 'Industrial Machinery Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-DEF456', status: 'pending', price: '-', validity: '-' }, { id: 3, catalog: 'Organic Textiles', seller: 'VEND-23-XYZ789', status: 'accepted', price: '$3500', validity: '2025-10-30' } ]; const surveys = [ { id: 1, catalog: 'Premium Electronics Components', seller: 'VEND-23-ABC123', status: 'fee_paid', fee: '$150' }, { id: 2, catalog: 'Industrial Machinery Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-DEF456', status: 'report_received', fee: '$200' } ]; const orders = [ { id: 1, catalog: 'Organic Textiles', seller: 'VEND-23-XYZ789', status: 'in_transit', tracking: 'TRK-2025-789456' } ]; return (
{activeTab === 'rfqs' && (

Requested Quotations (RFQs)

{rfqs.map(rfq => ( ))}
Catalog Seller Status Price Validity Actions
{rfq.catalog} {rfq.seller} {rfq.status.replace('_', ' ')} {rfq.price} {rfq.validity} {rfq.status === 'priced' && ( <> )}
)} {activeTab === 'surveys' && (

My Surveys

{surveys.map(survey => ( ))}
Catalog Seller Status Survey Fee Actions
{survey.catalog} {survey.seller} {survey.status.replace('_', ' ')} {survey.fee} {survey.status === 'fee_paid' && ( )} {survey.status === 'report_received' && ( <> )}
)} {activeTab === 'orders' && (

My Orders

{orders.map(order => ( ))}
Catalog Seller Status Tracking Actions
{order.catalog} {order.seller} {order.status.replace('_', ' ')} {order.tracking}
)} {activeTab === 'invoices' && (

My Invoices

Invoice management features will be implemented here.

)} {activeTab === 'disputes' && (

Dispute Management

Dispute management features will be implemented here.

)} ); }; export default BuyerDashboard;
